attributes.action: stop the changes to the driving test
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
From September the DSA are going to change the  driving test 
For ten minutes  you will have to follow road signs or a diagram or a list of directions 
I think this will make the test harder for people  that suffer with disabilities like autism , dyslexia or for people who do not speak English  , it will also make it harder for people that get very nervous under test conditions  or do not live in towns with test centres  
The DSA estimate that it will take on average about five more hours to  pass your driving test  so costing about £100 more to learn to drive
If you think these changes are wrong sign this petition
